io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.service

Interface NucleusWarningService


  • public interface NucleusWarningService
    A service that allows plugins to obtain information about user warnings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addWarning(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User toWarn, org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandSource warner, java.lang.String reason, java.time.Duration duration)
      Adds a warning to a player.
      boolean expireWarning(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user, Warning warning, org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.Cause cause)
      Expires (or removes) a warning.
      java.util.List<Warning> getWarnings(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user)
      Gets all warnings (active and expired) for a User

    • Method Detail

      • addWarning

        boolean addWarning(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User toWarn,
                   org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandSource warner,
                   java.lang.String reason,
                   @Nullable
                   java.time.Duration duration)
        Adds a warning to a player.
        Parameters:
        toWarn - The user to warn.
        warner - The CommandSource to attribute the warning to.
        reason - The reason for the warning.
        duration - The Duration the warning should last for from this moment before it expires. Set to null if infinite.
        Returns:
        true if successful.

      • getWarnings

        java.util.List<Warning> getWarnings(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user)
        Gets all warnings (active and expired) for a User
        Parameters:
        user - The User to get the warnings for.
        Returns:
        The Warnings.

      • expireWarning

        boolean expireWarning(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user,
                      Warning warning,
                      org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.Cause cause)
        Expires (or removes) a warning.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to remove the warning from.
        warning - The Warning to remove.
        cause - The Cause. This should normally have your plugin as the root, but can be a player if it is due to a direct action of that player.
        Returns:
        true if successful.
